title: Expand the Valentine letter to ~500 words

requirements.text: Replace the current short letter content in the Valentine invitation letter with a single cohesive heartfelt English letter of approximately 500 words, keeping the final main question “Will you be my Valentine?” as the prominent call-to-action line on the letter.

quotes: make a big letter of 500 words

acceptanceCriteria: The rendered letter body (excluding the final “Will you be my Valentine?” headline) is approximately 500 words (acceptable range: 450–550).
The letter remains romantic and suitable for asking the user’s girlfriend to be their Valentine.
The existing animated line/letter reveal behavior still works (no broken layout, no missing text).
The final main question text remains exactly: “Will you be my Valentine?” and remains visually prominent.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not add or require any backend canister logic for this change.
nonGoals: Changing CTA button behavior, outcomes, or scene transitions.
Generating or modifying any image assets.
